CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Total_Due_IMPORT__c)), Total_Due_IMPORT__c > 0), Total_Due_IMPORT__c, Liquidated_Damages_Due__c + Subtotal_LC_98_1__c + Expenses_Due__c + Deductions_Recovered_Due__c + LC_203_1_NSF_Check_Penalty_Due__c + LC_203_Waiting_Time_Penalty_Due__c + LC_226f_Due__c + LC_1198_5_k_Due__c + Total_Interest__c + Other_Due__c)
CustomField.label: Total Due
